summary: During a clash between demonstrating laborers, a policeman and a student are both killed. In charge of the case are a magistrate and two commissioners.
cast: Massimo Ranieri|Martin Balsam|Valentina Cortese|Turi Ferro|Pino Colizzi|Salvo Randone|Luigi Diberti|Petra Pauly|Mariano Rigillo|Carlo Valli|Sergio Enria|Gino Milli|Piero Gerlini|Luigi Bonos|Aldo Ricci|Massimo Sarchielli|Alessandra Cardini|Anna Fadda|Alain Naya|Paolo Bonetti|Alessandro Francisci|Giovanni Melli|Angelo Boscariol|Giovanni Febraro
title: Proceso a un estudiante acusado de homicidio
